name: web_scraper_chatbot
description: INSTRUCTION TO RUN THE PROJECT STEP1:travers to the rooot directory and download the node modules, command npm i STEP2: download the necessary pyhthon dependies requires STEp3:start the server node ./bin/www Step 4: Access the Application Once the server starts successfully, you can access the application in your browser at the following URL:http://localhost:3000
